content.raw:
Just to add a little bit more color to my initial description:

* The leak in src/Converter.cc happens every time it is used, I think.  I don't think the Converter class is heavily used, but this should clean that leak up.
* The leak in src/parser_urdf.cc only triggers only happens in the error case.
* The changes to Converter_TEST.cc, parser_urdf_TEST.cc, and test/integration/* aren't really necessary, but will make future analysis easier.
content.html:
Just to add a little bit more color to my initial description:

  • The leak in src/Converter.cc happens every time it is used, I think. I don't think the Converter class is heavily used, but this should clean that leak up.
  • The leak in src/parser_urdf.cc only triggers only happens in the error case.
  • The changes to Converter_TEST.cc, parser_urdf_TEST.cc, and test/integration/* aren't really necessary, but will make future analysis easier.
